quotes.quote: Achievement seems to be connected with action. Successful men and women keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
No one has ever achieved greatness without dreams.
Every achievement is a servitude. It compels us to a higher achievement.
All achievements, all earned riches, have their beginning in an idea.
Our achievements speak for themselves. What we have to keep track of are our failures, discouragements and doubts.
Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
Achievement has no color.
If you want to achieve your goals, help others achieve theirs.
Great achievement is usually born of great sacrifice, and is never the result of selfishness.
The value of achievement lies in the achieving.
There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
Our achievements of today are but the sum total of our thoughts of yesterday.
To achieve the impossible; it is precisely the unthinkable that must be thought.
A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.
Take into account that great love and great achievements involve great risk.
All great achievements require time.
You are the greatest achievement of your own life.
Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
Achievement is largely the product of steadily raising one's level of aspiration and expectation.
Any great achievement is preceded by many difficulties and many lessons; great achievements are not possible without them.
Patience is not a virtue. It is an achievement.
Achievement results from work realizing ambition.
Only those who attempt the absurd can achieve the impossible.
Every great achievement is the victory of a flaming heart.
The most splendid achievement of all is the constant striving to surpass yourself and to be worthy of your own approval.
Dissatisfaction with possession and achievement is one of the requisites to further achievement.
Simplicity is the final achievement.
All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers.
Those who believe that they are exclusively in the right are generally those who achieve something.
There is no great achievement that is not the result of patient working and waiting.
Failures are finger posts on the road to achievement.
Without failure there is no achievement.
People seem to think that life began with the achievement of personal independence.
To achieve something is better than not achieving.
The starting point of all achievement is desire.
That some achieve great success, is proof to all that others can achieve it as well.
Use missteps as stepping stones to deeper understanding and greater achievement.
The only real limitation on your abilities is the level of your desires. If you want it badly enough, there are no limits on what you can achieve.
An achievement is a bondage. It obliges one to a higher achievement.
Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve
The Roots for true achievement lie in the will to become the best that you can become.
Even a mistake may turn out to be the one thing necessary to a worthwhile achievement.
Man has always needed to believe in some form of a continuity of achievement.
Hard work is the foundation of all achievements, and no one ever succeeds without hard work.
Behind every great achievement is a dreamer of great dreams.
A dream becomes a goal when action is taken toward its achievement.
Don't mistake activity with achievement.
The achievement of one goal should be the starting point of another.
